name: Admin Console Release 24.2
description: This release of the Admin Console brings you a few enhancements and a few bug fixes, see below for details on some of the more notable changes applied to the Admin Console.

IMPROVED.text: Removed ‘Instagram’ configuration from the Admin Console under the Social Provider section.
Removed the 'Service Provider Certificate' field from SAML in IDP Initiated Login flow under the Admin Console.

FIXED.text: If you have enabled 'PIN Authentication' feature then 'PIN' field is removable from Admin Console under the Data Schema section.
All Additional API secrets are visible in the Admin Console under the Additional API Secret(s) section.
